      abstract double bui(double dc, double dmc)
      BUI provides a numerical, relative indication of the amount of fuel available for combustion.

      Calculate the FWI statistics from the given inputs.
      abstract double dailyFfmcVanWagner(double inFFMC, double rain, double temperature, double rh, double ws)
      Calculates daily FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), based on the previous day's FFMC and provided conditions.

      Calculates DC (drought code) given the previous day's DC and provided conditions.

      abstract double hourlyFfmcEquilibriumPrevious(double currFFMC, double rain, double temperature, double rh, double ws)
      Calculates the previous hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using equilibrium mathematical model, based on the current hour's FFMC and previous hour's provided conditions.
      abstract double hourlyFfmcLawson(double prevFFMC, double currFFMC, double rh, Duration span)
      Calculates hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using Lawson's mathematical model, based on the previous and current daily FFMC values (using Van Wagner) and provided conditions.

      • calculate

        public abstract void calculate()
                        throws IOException
        Calculate the FWI statistics from the given inputs.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcVanWagner

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcVanWagner(double inFFMC,
                                           double rain,
                                           double temperature,
                                           double rh,
                                           double ws,
                                           Duration span)
                                    throws IOException
        Calculates hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using Van Wagner's mathematical model, based on the previous hour's FFMC and provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels.
        Parameters:
        inFFMC - The previous time's Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rain - Precipitation since observed FFMC (mm).
        temperature - The temperature (Celsius).
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        span - Seconds since observed ffmc.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcEquilibrium

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcEquilibrium(double inFFMC,
                                             double rain,
                                             double temperature,
                                             double rh,
                                             double ws,
                                             Duration span)
                                      throws IOException
        Calculates hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using the experimental Equilibrium mathematical model developed by K. Anderson, based on the previous hour's FFMC and provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels.
        Parameters:
        inFFMC - The previous time's Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rain - Precipitation since observed FFMC (mm).
        temperature - The temperature (Celsius).
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        span - Seconds since observed ffmc.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcLawson

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcLawson(double prevFFMC,
                                        double currFFMC,
                                        double rh,
                                        Duration span)
                                 throws IOException
        Calculates hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using Lawson's mathematical model, based on the previous and current daily FFMC values (using Van Wagner) and provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other
        Parameters:
        prevFFMC - The previous day's standard daily Van Wagner FFMC value.
        currFFMC - The current day's standard daily Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        span - The time to calculate the FFMC value for (seconds into day).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcVanWagnerPrevious

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcVanWagnerPrevious(double currFFMC,
                                                   double rain,
                                                   double temperature,
                                                   double rh,
                                                   double ws)
                                            throws IOException
        Calculates the previous hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using Van Wagner's mathematical model, based on the current hour's FFMC and previous hour's provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels.
        Parameters:
        currFFMC - The current time's Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rain - Precipitation in the prior hour (mm).
        temperature - The prior hours temperature (Celsius).
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcEquilibriumPrevious

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcEquilibriumPrevious(double currFFMC,
                                                     double rain,
                                                     double temperature,
                                                     double rh,
                                                     double ws)
                                              throws IOException
        Calculates the previous hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using equilibrium mathematical model, based on the current hour's FFMC and previous hour's provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels.
        Parameters:
        currFFMC - The current time's Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rain - Precipitation in the prior hour (mm).
        temperature - The prior hours temperature (Celsius).
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • hourlyFfmcLawsonContiguous

        public abstract double hourlyFfmcLawsonContiguous(double prevFFMC,
                                                  double currFFMC,
                                                  double rh0,
                                                  double rh,
                                                  double rh1,
                                                  Duration span)
                                           throws IOException
        Calculates a contiguous hourly FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), using Lawson's mathematical model, based on the daily Van Wagner FFMC values for the previous and current days, as well as current provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels. This technique uses linear interpolation between 11am and noon LST. It also applies similar smoothing in morning hours.
        Parameters:
        prevFFMC - The previous day's standard daily Van Wagner FFMC value.
        currFFMC - The current day's standard daily Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rh0 - Relative humidity at the start of the hour, expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        rh - Instantaneous relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        rh1 - Relative humidity at the end of the hour (start of next hour) expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        span - The time to calculate the FFMC value for.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dailyFfmcVanWagner

        public abstract double dailyFfmcVanWagner(double inFFMC,
                                          double rain,
                                          double temperature,
                                          double rh,
                                          double ws)
                                   throws IOException
        Calculates daily FFMC (fine fuel moisture code), based on the previous day's FFMC and provided conditions. FFMC is a numerical rating of the moisture content of litter and other cured fine fuels.
        Parameters:
        inFFMC - The previous day's Van Wagner FFMC value.
        rain - Precipitation in the prior 24 hours (noon to noon, LST) (mm).
        temperature - Noon (LST) temperature (Celsius).
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]).
        ws - Wind speed (kph) at noon LST.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dMC

        public abstract double dMC(double inDMC,
                           double rain,
                           double temperature,
                           double latitude,
                           double longitude,
                           int month,
                           double rh)
                    throws IOException
        Calculates daily DMC (duff moisture code) given the previous day's DMC and provided conditions. DMC provides a numerical rating of the average moisture content of the loosely compact organic layers of a moderate depth (5-10cm).
        Parameters:
        inDMC - The previous day's DMC value.
        rain - Precipitation in the prior 24 hours (noon to noon, LST) (mm).
        temperature - Noon (LST) temperature (Celsius).
        latitude - Radians, used to determine the appropriate table as defined in "Latitude Considerations in Adapting the Canadian Forest Fire Weather Index System To Other Countries", M.E. Alexander, in prep as Index X in Weather Guide for the Canadian Forest Fire Danger Rating System by B.D. Lawson, O.B. Armitage.
        longitude - Radians, reserved for future use, currently unused (may be if/as/when more regional constants are defined).
        month - Origin 0 (January = 0, December = 11)
        rh - Relative humidity expressed as a fraction ([0..1]) at noon LST.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dC

        public abstract double dC(double inDC,
                          double rain,
                          double temperature,
                          double latitude,
                          double longitude,
                          int month)
                   throws IOException
        Calculates DC (drought code) given the previous day's DC and provided conditions. DC provides a numerical rating of the average moisture content of the deep (10-24 cm), compact organic layers.
        Parameters:
        inDC - The previous day's DC value.
        rain - Precipitation in the prior 24 hours (noon to noon, LST) (mm).
        temperature - Noon (LST) temperature (Celsius).
        latitude - Radians, used to determine the appropriate table as defined in "Latitude Considerations in Adapting the Canadian Forest Fire Weather Index System To Other Countries", M.E. Alexander, in prep as Index X in Weather Guide for the Canadian Forest Fire Danger Rating System by B.D. Lawson, O.B. Armitage.
        longitude - Radians, reserved for future use, currently unused (may be if/as/when more regional constants are defined).
        month - Origin 0 (January = 0, December = 11).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • fF

        public abstract double fF(double ffmc,
                          int seconds)
                   throws IOException
        Calculates f(F), which is used to calculate ISI from FFMC.
        Parameters:
        ffmc - FFMC value.
        seconds - Time since observed FFMC.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isiFwi

        public abstract double isiFwi(double ffmc,
                              double ws,
                              Duration dur)
                       throws IOException
        ISI provides a numerical rating of the relative expected rate of fire spread.
        Parameters:
        ffmc - FFMC value.
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        dur - Time since observed FFMC.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isiFbp

        public abstract double isiFbp(double ffmc,
                              double ws,
                              Duration dur)
                       throws IOException
        ISI provides a numerical rating of the relative expected rate of fire spread. The FBP system uses a local site-specific ISI influenced by topography.
        Parameters:
        ffmc - FFMC value.
        ws - Wind speed (kph).
        dur - Time since observed FFMC.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        dmc - DMC value.
